query:
SELECT 
  p.id, p.name,
  COALESCE(SUM(pu.quantity), 0) as total_purchased,
  COALESCE(SUM(c.quantity), 0) as total_consumed,
  COALESCE(SUM(g.quantity), 0) as total_given_away,
  (COALESCE(SUM(pu.quantity), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(c.quantity), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(g.quantity), 0)) as calculated_stock
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN purchases pu ON p.id = pu.productId
LEFT JOIN consumption c ON p.id = c.productId
LEFT JOIN giveaways g ON p.id = g.productId
WHERE p.name LIKE '%Nicaragua%'
GROUP BY p.id, p.name;

  (COALESCE(SUM(pu.quantity), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(c.quantity), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(g.quantity), 0)) as calculated_stock
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN purchases pu ON p.id = pu.productId
LEFT JOIN consumption c ON p.id = c.productId
LEFT JOIN giveaways g ON p.id = g.productId
WHERE p.name LIKE '%Nicaragua%'
GROUP BY p.id, p.name;
